rawls.scene.filter¶

Filter class which store Filter information

Classes

Filter(name, params_names, params_values, …)

Filter class which store Filter params information
class rawls.scene.filter.Filter(name, params_names, params_values, params_types)[source]¶

Filter class which store Filter params information

name¶

{str} – name of the kind of Filter used

params_name¶

[{str}] – parameters names of Filter used

params_values¶

[{str}] – parameters values of Filter used

params_types¶

[{str}] – parameters values of Filter used
